scripts.dev: concurrently -k --names py,node,web "conda run -n trend-forecasting-py python -m uvicorn main:app --host 127.0.0.1 --port 8001 --app-dir backend/python" "set PYTHON_API=http://127.0.0.1:8001&& node backend/node/app.js" "node frontend/node_modules/vite/bin/vite.js --config frontend/vite.config.js"
scripts.py:dev: conda run -n trend-forecasting-py python -m uvicorn main:app --reload --reload-dir backend/python --host 127.0.0.1 --port 8001 --app-dir backend/python
scripts.py:serve: conda run -n trend-forecasting-py python -m uvicorn main:app --host 127.0.0.1 --port 8001 --app-dir backend/python
scripts.py:install: conda run -n trend-forecasting-py pip install -r backend/python/requirements.txt
scripts.kill:ports: powershell -NoProfile -ExecutionPolicy Bypass -Command "$ports = 8000,8001,3001,5173; $pids = Get-NetTCPConnection -State Listen -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue | Where-Object { $ports -contains $_.LocalPort } | Select-Object -ExpandProperty OwningProcess -Unique; if ($pids) { $pids | ForEach-Object { Stop-Process -Id $_ -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue }; Write-Host ('Stopped PIDs: ' + ($pids -join ', ')) } else { Write-Host 'No listening processes found on 8000/8001/3001/5173' }"
